summary: Pantea is available in UUNP & CBBE; With or Without HDT.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]https://s5.postimg.cc/8k3qfwpzb/panteatitle.png[/img][/center][center][img]https://s5.postimg.cc/nrjq09htz/20170130224415_1.jpg[/img]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/q8kmqqt53/Info.png[/img]
[font=Verdana]Name:  Pantea
Race:  Custom Imperial
Voice:  Female Sultry
Marriageable:  Yes
Height:  1.00
Weight:  64
Body:  UUNP(SevenBase Preset) & Custom CBBE
Skin:  Optimized Fair Skin
Armor:  Emfy Cleric
Weapon:  Emfy Mace (Right Hand) & Alteration/Restoration Spells (Left Hand)
Location:  Solitude - Temple of the Divines

Class:  Spellsword
Style:  Boss One Hand

Levels with player.  Imperial traits/bonuses.
Skills/Perk Trees:  One Hand, Restoration, Alteration, Heavy Armor
Spells:  Restoration & Alteration Focused

Tested with AFT & EFF
ENBs pictured:  Vividian & RealVision

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/5xjml89dz/20170130225126_1.jpg[/img]

[youtube]giOKd4BrP2w[/youtube]
[youtube]txROaqtzbEM[/youtube]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/czbb4dts7/Requirements.png[/img]
[b][u]HDT/Armor Versions[/u][/b]

HDT Compatible Skeleton
HDT Physics

[b][u]Non HDT/No Armor Versions[/u][/b]

None Known At This Time

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/3q94u9kw7/Recommended.png[/img]
Modified Skeleton such as XPMSE
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457/?]Facelight[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76051/?]Are You There[/url]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/iidullqtj/Known_Issues.png[/img]
[/url]Some ENBs may show slight skin discoloration between body and head

Armor may clip during some poses/animations

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/8hf9fbwxz/20170130224638_1.jpg[/img]

[/url][url=https://www.facebook.com/groups/218944591881610/]Skyrim Mods & Modders[/url]

[url=https://www.facebook.com/groups/bethesdamods/]Bethesda Mod Creation Collective[/url]
[url=https://www.facebook.com/groups/SkyrimModsFollowerHoarders/]Skyrim Mods Follower Hoarders

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/hnxk2m26f/20170120230057_1.jpg[/img]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/8r3pgoykn/Q&A.png[/img][/url]
Q:  Why do you make so many followers?
A:  I'm a follower hoarder/addict; since there is no Followers Anon I only have Nexus.

Q:  Will you release the Racemenu preset?
A:  My apologies, I no longer release my personal presets.

Q:  What armor can be put on the UUNP version?
A:  SeveNBase armors will work just fine with Vermith.
A:  Pantea's body is just a tweaked SeveNBase preset.

Q:  What are the other armors pictured in screenshots?
A:  Leather Robe & Sorakage (Google is your friend)

Q:  Do you take requests, suggestions, complaints?
A:  I'm open to all requests, suggestions, and feedback as long as they are polite.
